name: Kromaticube (itch)
description:
KROMATICUBE is a simple arcade game where you have to avoid obstacles while listening to chiptune musics. Stay alive for at least 60 seconds to complete a level. It is designed for tryharder gamers and all retro gaming lovers.

Each level has it own chiptune music and ramdomly generated obstacles.

-----

Features List

  • 6 different levels with their own atmosphere
  • 25 different patterns and obstacles
  • Infinite scoring possible

#arcade #action #pixelart #chiptune #tryhard #retro
